Articles.Content:
When I try to launch any craft, it sinks into the ground for a split second and then i get a black screen. If I then proceed to open the orbit map, Kerbin has disappeared ( I can look around 360 degrees and it isn't there)

Picture of my space center when I access it

![eaeffd5306.jpg](http://puu.sh/hDHDM/eaeffd5306.jpg)

Can anyone help? It happens everytime I open it, and every save I create

This started to happen to me and its really bothering me because I dont know how to fix it. I finally started moving beyond the Kerbin system and this is what I get.![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

EDIT:

I suspect this has something to do with it (I found this in the log files)

"[LOG 01:23:00.498] Look rotation viewing vector is zero[LOG 01:23:00.507] Look rotation viewing vector is zero

[LOG 01:23:00.507] Look rotation viewing vector is zero

[LOG 01:23:00.519] Look rotation viewing vector is zero

[LOG 01:23:00.519] Look rotation viewing vector is zero"

This repeats many, *many* more times.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-14T08:27:10Z" title="06/14/2015 08:27  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 14, 2015</time> by Dnaha**

no.

go through the past 50 posts and very few of them will have solutions

EDIT: might-as-well try to be helpfull, try this

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118872-Look-rotation-viewing-vector-is-zero-Black-screen](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118872-Look-rotation-viewing-vector-is-zero-Black-screen)
